document.text:
From 
To: Christian Everdell <CEverdell®CohenGressencom>, "Mark S. Cohen" 
<mcohen@CohenGressencom>, Jeff Pagliuca <jpagliuca@hmflaw.cotn>, "Laura 
Menninger" <Imenninger®lunflaw.com>, "Bobbi Stemheim (bcsternheim@mac.com)" 
<bcstemheim(a 
mac.com> 
Cc: 
Subject: US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - discovery production 
Date: Mon, 09 Nov 2020 23:12:44 +0000 
Attachments: 2020.11.09_Maxwell Discovery_Letter.pdf 
SANYS)" 
Counsel, 
A hard drive containing a new discovery production in the above referenced case is now available for pickup at One St. 
Andrew's Plaza. Attached please find the accompanying letter. Please note that page 5 of the letter contains a disclosure 
regarding a witness statement. 
As indicated in the letter, we are also sending this production, together with copies of prior productions that we have 
previously discussed, to the MDC for Ms. Maxwell's review. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York. NY 10007 
EFTA00020832
